infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Allow this app to take photos to include in support tickets
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Allow this app to use your location in rare cases
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Allow this app to take videos with audio to include in support tickets
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Allow this app to attach photos from your library to support tickets
